hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Top: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.
